summary: Páll is an artistic and sensitive young man. Getting dumped by his girlfriend, Dagny, triggers his descent into madness. We follow him on his way to what seems like inevitable doom; at home... See full summary »
cast: Ingvar Sigurdsson|Baltasar Kormákur|Hilmir Snær Guðnason|Björn Jörundur Friðbjörnsson|Margrét Helga Jóhannsdóttir|Theodór Júlíusson|Friðrik Steinn Friðriksson|Sara Margrét Nordahl|Halldóra Geirharðsdóttir|Þór Tulinius|Hrönn Steingrímsdóttir|Pétur Einarsson|Egill Ólafsson|Pálmi Gestsson|Jón Karl Helgason|Baldvin Halldórsson|Jón Hjartarson|Inga Maria Valdimarsdóttir|Jóhannes Skúlason|Salka Svanhvítardóttir|Jóhanna Jónas|Geo von Krogh|Rúrik Haraldsson|Anna Kristín Arngrímsdóttir|Gunnar Heidar|Jón Stefán Kristjánsson|Jón Þór Ólafsson|Höskuldur Skagfjörð|Fjölnir Bragason|Grímur Hjartarson|Kristján Ingi Sigurðsson|Sölvi Fannar Viðarsson|Alfreð Kristjánsson|Birgir Sigurðsson|Bjarni Þór Grétarsson|Dagbjartur Guðmundsson|Ragnar Unnarsson|Sigurjón Árnason|Snæbjörn Sigurðarson|Mike Downey|Pétur Ólafsson|Thorarinn Oskar Thorarinsson|Einar Sigurgeirsson|Gunnhildur Sigurðardóttir|Erna Gísladóttir|Guðjón Þorsteinn Pálmarsson|Ingvar Hreinsson|Gunnlaugur Helgason|Sara Nassim|Joi Johannsson|Hans Peter Kochenrath
title: Englar alheimsins
